alert.note: Alert for South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 10:33PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sioux and northeastern Goshen Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 933 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Jay Em, or 19 miles north of Torrington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
